name: Space Crusader: Alpha
description:
Space Crusader; an ongoing development project using the Unity Engine.

Blast your way through enemies to reach the finish and rack up a new high-score!

Space crusader is a development project created to give DaishGames experience in developing 2D animations and arcade mechanics.

Disclaimer: There may be bugs present in this game but as stated above, this is a work-in-progress build and unfortunately bugs are to be expected (however, we haven't yet found any bugs which significantly impact gameplay).

Game features soundtrack throughout.

Alpha contains: Tutorial, Level 1
